speaker: RICHARD
text:
Now
              ,
               
              my
               
              Lord
               
              Hastings
               
              and
               
              Sir
               
              William
               
              Stanley
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Leave
               
              off
               
              to
               
              wonder
               
              why
               
              I
               
              drew
               
              you
               
              hither

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Into
               
              this
               
              chiefest
               
              thicket
               
              of
               
              the
               
              park
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Thus
               
              stands
               
              the
               
              case
              :
               
              you
               
              know
               
              our
               
              king
              ,
               
              my
               
              brother
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Is
               
              prisoner
               
              to
               
              the
               
              Bishop
               
              here
              ,
               
              at
               
              whose
               
              hands

speaker: RICHARD
text:
He
               
              hath
               
              good
               
              usage
               
              and
               
              great
               
              liberty
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
And
              ,
               
              often
               
              but
               
              attended
               
              with
               
              weak
               
              guard
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Comes
               
              hunting
               
              this
               
              way
               
              to
               
              disport
               
              himself
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
I
               
              have
               
              advertised
               
              him
               
              by
               
              secret
               
              means

speaker: RICHARD
text:
That
              ,
               
              if
               
              about
               
              this
               
              hour
               
              he
               
              make
               
              this
               
              way

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Under
               
              the
               
              color
               
              of
               
              his
               
              usual
               
              game
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
He
               
              shall
               
              here
               
              find
               
              his
               
              friends
               
              with
               
              horse
               
              and
               
              men

speaker: RICHARD
text:
To
               
              set
               
              him
               
              free
               
              from
               
              his
               
              captivity
              .

speaker: HUNTSMAN
text:
This
               
              way
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,
               
              for
               
              this
               
              way
               
              lies
               
              the
               
              game
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              this
               
              way
              ,
               
              man
              .
               
              See
               
              where
               
              the
               
              huntsmen
               
              stand
              .
              —

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Now
              ,
               
              brother
               
              of
               
              Gloucester
              ,
               
              Lord
               
              Hastings
              ,
               
              and
               
              the
               
              rest
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Stand
               
              you
               
              thus
               
              close
               
              to
               
              steal
               
              the
               
              Bishop’s
               
              deer
              ?

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Brother
              ,
               
              the
               
              time
               
              and
               
              case
               
              requireth
               
              haste
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Your
               
              horse
               
              stands
               
              ready
               
              at
               
              the
               
              park
               
              corner
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
But
               
              whither
               
              shall
               
              we
               
              then
              ?

speaker: HASTINGS
text:
To
               
              Lynn
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,
               
              and
               
              shipped
               
              from
               
              thence
               
              to
               
              Flanders
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Well
               
              guessed
              ,
               
              believe
               
              me
              ,
               
              for
               
              that
               
              was
               
              my
               
              meaning
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Stanley
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              requite
               
              thy
               
              forwardness
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
But
               
              wherefore
               
              stay
               
              we
              ?
               
              ’Tis
               
              no
               
              time
               
              to
               
              talk
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Huntsman
              ,
               
              what
               
              sayst
               
              thou
              ?
               
              Wilt
               
              thou
               
              go
               
              along
              ?

speaker: HUNTSMAN
text:
Better
               
              do
               
              so
               
              than
               
              tarry
               
              and
               
              be
               
              hanged
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Come
               
              then
              ,
               
              away
              !
               
              Let’s
               
              ha’
               
              no
               
              more
               
              ado
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Bishop
              ,
               
              farewell
              ;
               
              shield
               
              thee
               
              from
               
              Warwick’s
               
              frown
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              pray
               
              that
               
              I
               
              may
               
              repossess
               
              the
               
              crown
              .
